Actions.Name: Devour
Actions.Description:
The Ghul becomes immobile and must take a slow turn next round. At the start of that turn, it emits an aura 2 effect around it, which only affects non-relict characters. It has different effects depending on the number of non-relict characters in the aura. Damage dealt is divine.
1 character: 100% HP.
2 characters: 50% HP.
3+ characters: 25% HP.
